about_the_game:
The Hawkers is a unique combination of Farming Game and Tycoon, with a pixel art style that will immerse you in a nostalgic and charming experience. Here, you'll create and customize your own character and embark on the adventure of managing a farm and building your dream shop. Get ready for an adventure full of possibilities and challenges!

▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

☙ Gameplay ❧


In The Hawkers, the gameplay focuses on managing and expanding your own farm. From planting and harvesting crops to taking care of your animals, each day brings new challenges and opportunities. Additionally, you will have the freedom to transport your products to the market, where you can sell them and earn money to reinvest in your farm and shop.



☙ Design and Art ❧


The game features a unique pixel art style, carefully designed to create a cozy and attractive atmosphere. Every detail, from the characters to the landscapes, has been crafted with love and dedication to offer an unforgettable visual experience.





☙ Building and Customization ❧


Build and customize your shop from the ground up. Decide how you want it to look and function, choose the items you will sell, and design the interior to your liking. Customization doesn't stop at the shop; you can also decorate and upgrade your home, creating a space that reflects your personal style.

☙ Rich Content and Variety ❧


With a wide range of activities and objectives, The Hawkers offers hours of entertainment. Plant and harvest various crops, raise animals, upgrade your shop and home, and discover new items and enhancements. The game is full of content and surprises that will keep you hooked.

☙ Tycoon and Strategy ❧


In addition to farm management, The Hawkers incorporates Tycoon elements that will allow you to make strategic decisions to maximize your profits and expand your agricultural empire. Learn to balance your resources, time, and efforts to build the most prosperous farm and shop in the region.

☙ Characters and Relationships ❧


The game features more than 100 distinct characters, each of whom can grant you special abilities if you become friends. You might share your life with these characters and possibly have future children who will help you along the way. The relationships and connections you build will not only enrich your gaming experience but also provide unique benefits for your farm and shop.



☙ Game Story ❧


In The Hawkers, you will not only manage your farm and shop but also be part of an emotional story. As a child, you visited your grandfather in a picturesque town, creating unforgettable memories on his farm. Years later, you return to find the town threatened by Mr. Bunny, a ruthless businessman with plans to buy the entire town and transform it into a huge city.

Determined to save the town and honor your grandfather's legacy, you take on the challenge of reviving the farm, rebuilding the community, and thwarting Mr. Bunny's plans. Through hard work, smart management, and the support of the villagers, you strive to protect the town from corporate takeover and preserve its charm and traditions.

Embark on this charming adventure of farming, business management, and community restoration! Can you save the town and secure its future? Play The Hawkers and find out!


"Support The Hawkers on Kickstarter ➲"
